before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"972fo","text":"Saliva donor criteria","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjovm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f98i0","text":"Must have no/limited history of dental caries","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bc39v","text":" Must not have used antibiotics in the past 6 months","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"156me","text":"Abstain from oral hygiene 24 hours prior to donation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e65f8","text":"Refrain from eating and drinking (except water) 2 hours before donation","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9gg2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"66be6","text":"For experiments involving starches, donors should avoid eating starch-containing foods on the day of donation. To make this more bearable, saliva donation should take place in the morning before breakfast.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"emka8","text":"Collect the saliva by spitting into 50 ml plastic centrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eirre","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbsaa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3oejm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8r02a","text":"Make sure donors wear gloves to avoid contamination with non-oral bacteria.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed5e2","text":"Make a 2-fold dilution of saliva in sterile   and vortex the solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5mdtm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"","data":{"concentration":"20","error_concentration":false,"guid":"4E755EE0BE2E11EBB9E1457714C337EA","id":0,"label":"glycerol","scientificNotation":false,"unit":206}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7r8pr","text":"Stimulate saliva production by chewing tasteless gum or parafilm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"64l7p","text":"Before inoculation, vortex the saliva solution again.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
